channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Biblical Cosmology Episode 1: Principalities and Powers of Darkness [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
What is this universe that we live in? Its full of rocks and dust, hummingbirds and anteaters, black holes and microbials. But is it just stuff? What about the things we cannot see? The things that go bump in the night? 
     The bible is full of information about the unseen realm of this universe and it also has a lot to say about the conflict taking place in this war torn cosmos.
     This week the Rebels welcome back Air Jordan to launch a new mini series on biblical cosmology.  This introductory episode will set the ground work for a series exploring these unseen realities. If you have questions while we work our way through, please send them to us through any social media messaging or by emailing rebelpodcastflf@gmail.com
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris & Jordan, The Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastors Nate & Chris & Jordan, The Rebels

item.title: How To Quickly Ruin Your Marriage [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
This week as P Nate and Pootie wrap up the marriage series they take some time to talk about the various things NOT to do unless you want to ruin your marriage.  Take this as a practical field manual for marriage.


To support the show you can become a Fight Laugh Feast Club Member here: flfnetwork.com/membership/

You can also join the rebellion by sharing and inviting your friends to like the content on facebook: facebook.com/rebelpodcast or by supporting us through patreon at patreon.com/reformedrebel
